id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-1" value="RISK MANAGEMENT PROCESS<br>风险管理流程" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="50" width="260" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-8" value="<div>A BIOCOMPATIBILITY evaluation of a MEDICAL DEVICE is&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">part of an overall RISK MANAGEMENT PROCESS</span></div><div>医疗器械的生物相容性评估是整个风险管理过程的一部分<span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="50" width="330" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-9" value="HAZARD identification<br>危险识别" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=16;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="120" width="260" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-10" value="<div>As part of that PROCESS, all the potential HAZARDS associated&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">with the MEDICAL DEVICE should be identified</span></div><div>作为该过程的一部分，应该识别与医疗器械相关的所有潜在危险<span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="120" width="345" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-11" value="" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="130" y="170" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="130" y="240" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-12" value="" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="170" y="170" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="170" y="240" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-13" value="Other HAZARDS<br>其他危险" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="240" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-14" value="" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="170" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="280" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-15" value="HAZARDS related to the BIOCOMPATIBILITY of the breathing GAS PATHWAYS<div>与呼吸气体通路的生物相容性相关的危险<br></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="200" width="345" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-16" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="280" width="670" height="800" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell HAZARD identification<br>生物相容性危险识别" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=16;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-18" target="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-18" value="RISK ASSESSMENT<br>风险评估" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=16;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="480" width="260" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-19" value="Evolution plan<br>评估计划" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=default;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=16;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="607.5" width="260" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-20" value="<b style="font-size: 15px;">ISO 18562 covers this area<br>ISO 18562 包含此领域</b>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="290" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-21" value="<span style="background-color: initial;">Identify all the possible BIOCOMPATIBILITY related HAZARDS arising from the breathing GAS PATHWAYS<br></span>确定与呼吸气体通路相关的所有可能的生物相容性相关危险" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="355" width="345" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-22" value="Assess the RISKS associated with those BIOCOMPATIBILITY-related HAZARDS<br>评估与这些生物相容性相关的危险相关的风险" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="485" width="345" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="t4E7CcmXClBkYHlNB_MF-23" value="Make a BIOCOMPATIBILITY evaluation plan. This identifies the data required to assess the BIOCOMPATIBILITY of the MEDICAL DEVICE<br>制定生物相容性评估计划。这确定了评估医疗器械生物相容性所需的数据" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="600" width="345" height="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
RISK MANAGEMENT PROCESS
风险管理流程
